IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: IN FY 2023, MIAMI CITY BALLET TOOK THREE WORLD PREMIERES INTO ITS REPERTORY: DURANTE VERZOLA'S SENTIMIENTO, AMY HALL GARNER'S RESPLENDENT FANTASY, AND PONTUS LIDBERG'S PETRICHOR - AND 2 COMPANY PREMIERES - MARTHA GRAHAM'S DIVERSION OF ANGELS AND JEROME ROBBINS'S ANTIQUE EPIGRAPHS - WERE ADDED TO THE COMPANY'S ALREADY IMPRESSIVE CATALOG OF NEW WORKS FROM PIONEERING VOICES IN DANCE AND BALLET. MIAMI CITY BALLET SCHOOL ENROLLED 837 STUDENTS IN TRAINING PROGRAMS, AWARDING 572,110 IN SCHOLARSHIPS TO 124 STUDENTS, AND MIAMI CITY BALLET'S COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT INITIATIVES SERVED 12,233 PEOPLE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MIAMI CITY BALLET'S MISSION IS TO PRODUCE AND PRESENT THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF DANCE PERFORMANCES THROUGHOUT FLORIDA, THE UNITED STATES AND ABROAD; TRAIN YOUNG ASPIRING DANCERS; AND DEVELOP MIAMI CITY BALLET SCHOOL INTO A LEADER OF DANCE EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: PRESENTATION OF BALLET AND COMMUNITY EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS TO THE PUBLIC THROUGH VIRTUAL PROGRAMMING. APPROXIMATELY 86,964 PEOPLE BENEFITED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROMOTION OF BALLET THROUGH THE OPERATION OF A BALLET SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN. APPROXIMATELY 15,330 PEOPLE BENEFITED BY PARTICIPATION IN DANCE EDUCATION THROUGH THE SCHOOL-YEAR TRAINING, SUMMER INTENSIVE PROGRAMS, AND COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 4

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING INTERESTED PERSONS BOARD DIRECTOR ROBERT FRIEZO IS THE OWNER OF VERITY PARTNERS, INC., WHICH PROVIDES INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SERVICES TO MIAMI CITY BALLET. DURING FISCAL YEAR ENDING APRIL 30, 2023, THE ORGANIZATION PAID 102,716 TO VERITY PARTNERS, INC.

MIAMI CITY BALLET'S MISSION IS TO PRODUCE AND PRESENT THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF DANCE PERFORMANCES THROUGHOUT FLORIDA, THE UNITED STATES AND ABROAD; TRAIN YOUNG ASPIRING DANCERS; AND DEVELOP MIAMI CITY BALLET SCHOOL INTO A LEADER OF DANCE EDUCATION.
MADELINE ANBINDER STEPHEN ANBINDER TRUSTEE TRUSTEE MARRIED
REVIEWED BY BOARD LEADERSHIP AT TIME OF FILING.
POLICY IS REVIEWED AND DISCUSSED BY BOARD MEMBERS AND EMPLOYEES AT MEETINGS AND ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICTS THAT ARISE ARE REQUIRED TO BE DISCLOSED

THE ARTISTIC DIRECTOR'S CONTRACT WAS NEGOTIATED BY BOARD CHAIRMAN WITH REFERENCE TO COMPARABLE ARTISTIC DIRECTOR SALARIES, AND RATIFIED BY BOARD. THE BOARD CHAIRMAN AND VICE CHAIRMAN DETERMINES COMPENSATION FOR EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH REFERENCE TO COMPARABLE DATA, AND RATIFIED BY BOARD.
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND ARTISTIC DIRECTOR RECOMMEND COMPENSATION FOR OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES WITH REFERENCE TO COMPARABLE DATA.

THE BALLET LEASES ITS FACILITY IN MIAMI BEACH, FLORIDA UNDER THE TERMS OF A FINANCING LEASE WITH THE CITY OF MIAMI BEACH ("CITY") COMMENCING FEBRUARY 2006 AND EXPIRING 2046. THE BALLET HAS NOT HISTORICALLY RECORDED THE IN-KIND VALUE OF THE EXCESS OF THE FAIR MARKET VALUE OF THE FACILITY RENTAL OVER PAYMENTS MADE TO THE CITY (USE OF FACILITY). THE USE OF FACILITY AND THE CORRESPONDING NET ASSETS WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS - USE OF FACILITY WERE CORRECTED ON THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION (BALANCE SHEET) OF THE AUDIT AT APRIL 30, 2021 BY COMPUTING THE IN-KIND VALUE OF THE FUTURE BENEFIT USING A DISCOUNT RATE OF 5%. THE CORRECTION RESULTED IN A PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT TO NET ASSETS WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS FOR 50,588,567.
